message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that $15000 is your maximum budget. However, considering the product's value and rarity, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $16500. I believe this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's worth.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to go beyond $15000. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both our positions.

I understand that you're still hesitant to go beyond $15000, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm counteroffering at $16000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident that it's a fair price considering the product's value. If you're willing to meet me at this point, I'm willing to sell it to you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. Given your final offer of $16000, I would like to stick to my original maximum budget of $15000. I hope this aligns with your expectations for closing the deal.
